TEI.2.document_title: Aylett C Buckner to Stephen F Austin, 06-10-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Aylett C. Buckner to Austin, June 10, 1825. For the good of the colony suggests a referendum.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1132

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Aylett C. Buckner to Austin, June 10, 1825. For the good of the colony suggests a referendum.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Sir I appears that I am called here for undertaking one of the most just causes in my opinion imaginable that which is not only admitted of under *person_mentioned*free Governments */person_mentioned*but even under the most *person_mentioned*despotic Governments*/person_mentioned* Now sir as it respects myself I disregard rigid measures but sir you probably are not apprised of the bad effects it may have I do assure you sir it will enrage the people beyond all calculation and it will be the downfall of your-self and I believe the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*—These are the reasons why I make the following proposition which is this—*/p*
*p*That the whole *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*shall be called togather and if there is a majority in favor of the petition it shall go on if not it shall fall The people in every direction have herd of your irons for my imprisonment, as it respects myself I disregard all you can do I ask no favors, but for the prosperity of the *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*is the reason why I make the above proposition It is a proposition that *person_mentioned*every man in the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* will approve of with few exceptions*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Aylett C Buckner*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Austin */person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-10-1825">10th June 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
